abstract: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal walks out on news conference as speculation about his firing becomes hot topic.
lead_paragraph: Louis van Gaal walked out of a news conference Wednesday after becoming annoyed about speculation regarding his future as Manchester United’s manager.

headline.main: United’s Coach Walks Out on Reporters
headline.print_headline: United’s Coach Walks Out on Reporters

snippet: Louis van Gaal walked out of a news conference Wednesday after becoming annoyed about speculation regarding his future as Manchester United’s manager.
